title.value: Влияние удобрений и сортовых особенностей на урожайность и качество овощных бобов
Influence of fertilizers and varietal characteristics on yield and quality of vegetable beans

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Bosak, V.N., Belarus State Technological Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Skorina, V.V., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing
Minyuk, O.N., Belarus State Technological Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Vegetable beans (Vicia faba. var. major Harz.) are a valuable food crop, which also has important agronomic value in vegetable crop rotations. Studies on the effect of fertilizer application on yield and quality of vegetable bean varieties Belarusian and Russian black in a field experiment were conducted in sod-podzolic sandy loam soil in 2009-2011. During the studies on the sod-podzolic sandy loamy soil the application of fertilizers increased the yield of vegetable beans of 10,21-10,76 thd , raw protein 19,4-19,8% and economic efficiency 192,8-227,0 USD /ha-1 at the best indicators of productivity in the version with the addition N50P40K90 to the pre-cultivation. Straw of vegetable beans after grinding should be used for plowing as a valuable organic fertilizer, application that provides entry into the soil 93-145 kg / ha of nitrogen, 59-90 kg / ha of phosphorus, 315-439 kg / ha of potassium 84-101 kg / ha calcium and 43-52 kg / ha of magnesium.
